sense.def:
An accident
je dogodek, ki se zgodi povsem po naključju.

seg.quote: The fact that there is a university here is due to a historic accident.

sense.def:
An accident
je tudi neprijeten ali nesrečen dogodek, ki navadno povzroči poškodbo ali smrt.

seg.quote: She was killed in a motor accident.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
by accident
se zgodi po naključju.

seg.quote: I only came to Liverpool by accident.
